widgets_values: Combine videos here. The last frame of every prefixed video will cut to smooth out the combination.

nodes.title: Features
widgets_values: Enable features you want to use.

WAN 2.2 videos generate natively at 16fps or 24fps (or at least that's what I gen at). 

ðŸ’¡ MMAudio operates on 25fps! 

So, your video needs to be interpolated to 24fps at least to get audio working through MMAudio. 

Higher fps are no problem.

Use this node to create the desired fps through interpolation.

nodes.title: The MMAudio Sampler
widgets_values:
Leave the cfg alone as 4.5 is recommended.

30-50 steps, I just do 50 for the best quality.

While I do use the NSFW version of MMAudio, prompting does seem to work. You'll notice a lot of moaning no matter what you do, but it really depends on the seed. You can try different prompt styles and you'll get very different outputs. Highly recommend doing multiple runs until you get the sound you like for your video.

### Examples positives

Anime sex scene with female and orgasm
```
high pitched female vocals, anime style, loud intense orgasm, screaming, heavy breathing, fast rhythmic skin slapping, loud thighs slapping, wet squishing sounds, hard pounding, flesh impact, viscous friction, fast pace
```
Gagging while cumming on face
```
uh sound, gargle, swollowing
```

high pitched female vocals, anime style, loud intense orgasm, screaming, heavy breathing, fast rhythmic skin slapping, loud thighs slapping, wet squishing sounds, hard pounding, flesh impact, viscous friction, fast pace
noisy, harsh, crash, bang, music, background melody, synthesizer, male vocals, talking, speech, low quality, distorted, ambient noise, room tone, breathing
